duties_responsibilities.duty: Efficiently execute merchandising to ensure consistency with product sets and signage displays in the store and across multiple stores in a Market or District.
Assist in the receiving of merchandise, stock and price accurately, and provide guest service as necessary.
Perform all aspects of point-of-sale service, including cash sales, credit and check sales, returns, and exchanges.
Assist with the unloading, pricing, and stocking of merchandise according to operational guidelines.
Participate in the completion of quarterly and annual physical inventory counts.
Travel to designated store group to complete projects such as Category Reviews, Action Memos, Recalls, Resets, etc.
Analyze on-site/actual conditions, identify necessary corrections, recommend alterations, and troubleshoot resolution.
Communicate with leadership upon completion of day regarding any remaining unfinished projects, set changes, and screen correction information.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or its equivalent (GED) preferred, with basic math proficiency and above average communication skills.
